src:
VIDEO: Neverjetni prizor: iz zaboja rešili devet migrantov
Zgodilo se je na avtocesti Zagreb–Lipovac.
05 Nov 2019, 19:55 by M. U.
RASTOVICA – Hrvaški policisti so na avtocesti Zagreb–Lipovac v bližini počivališča Rastovica ustavili VW crafterja poljskih registrskih oznak. V njem je bil lesen zaboj, ki se uporablja za prevoz strojev, poroča Jutarnji list. Zaboj je bil zaprt z vijaki, iz njega pa so se slišali človeški glasovi. Ko so policisti odprli zaboj, so v njem našli devet migrantov in jim najverjetneje rešili življenje.



Našli so sedemčlansko člansko družino iz Irana in dva Iračana. Ob tem so aretirali voznika kombija. Hrvaška policija je sporočila, da gre za 21-letnega Ukrajinca.
text:
VIDEO: Incredible Scene: Nine Migrants Rescued from the Box
It happened on the Zagreb-Lipovac highway.
05 Nov 2019, 19:55 by M. U.
RASTOVICA - Croatian police officers stopped a VW crafter of Polish license plates on the Zagreb-Lipovac highway near Rastovica. It contained a wooden crate used for transporting machinery, reports Jutarnji List. The crate was closed with screws and human voices could be heard from it. When officers opened the crate, they found nine migrants in it and most likely saved their lives.



They found a seven-member family from Iran and two Iraqis. The driver of the van was arrested. Croatian police say they are a 21-year-old Ukrainian.
